ca.proj.game.entities

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.proj.game.entities.Entity
      • ca.proj.game.entities.Mob

  • public class NPC
extends Mob
    NPC.java represents non-playable-characters in game.       • NPC

        public NPC(Level level,
   int x,
   int y)
        Creates a new NPC.
        Parameters:
        level - the level to add the NPC to
        x - the x position on the level to add the NPC to
        y - the y position on the level to add the NPC to
